Module project
Package payrollGUI

Class Date

java.lang.Object
payrollGUI.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Date>
public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Date>
The Date class is used to hold a date with the variables: year, month, and day Provides easier ways to return a date for use.
Author:
Muhammad Faizan Saiyed, Michael Neustater

    • daysInMonth

      public int daysInMonth​(int year, int month)
      A helper method to find out how many days are in a specified month, including leap years
      Parameters:
      year - needs to be checked if it is a leap year.
      month - needs to see which month is being referred to, to return the correct days.
      Returns:
      an int of the amount of days in a specific month.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(Date date)
      A method used to compare two instances of the date class
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      date - object being compared to instance
      Returns:
      returns 1 if the instance is greater than the given, -1 if less than and 0 if equal
